---
title: PlistApi.plist_set_real_val method
---

Set the value of a node. Forces type of node to #PLIST_REAL

```csharp
public virtual void plist_set_real_val(PlistHandle node, double val)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| node | the node |
| val | the real value |
